chapter.title: Architecture
chapter.para: The OTRS framework is modular. The following picture shows the OTRS basic layer architecture.

sect1.title: Core Module
sect1.para: Core modules are located under $OTRS_HOME/Kernel/System/*. This layer is for the logical work. This modules are to handle system routines like "lock ticket" and "create ticket" A few main core modules are:

sect1.title: Frontend Handle
sect1.para: this is the interace between the browser, web server and the Frontend Modules. A Frontend Module can be used via the http-link.

sect1.title: CMD Frontend
sect1.para: The CMD Frontend is like the Web-Frontend-Handle and the Web-Frontend-Module in one (just without the LayoutObject) and is using the core modules to do some actions in the system.

sect1.title: Database
sect1.para: The database interface supports different databases.
